summary: How well do you know your video game trivia? Challenge yourself or have a video game trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode. It comes with the most popular video game categories including Arcade, Atari, Nintendo, Personal Computer, PlayStation, SEGA, and Xbox!

name: Villainess Idolized By Everyone
summary:
Eyes on her phone in the middle of the road, our heroine is hit by a truck and reincarnates into the game she had the misfortune of playing at that moment.

Now she's a villain of an otome, and she has to avoid a terrible fate!..

Or does she? Is the voice from the sky going to be of any help?

name: Virgil's Purgatory
summary: Virgil's Purgatory is a port of the 2016 PC metroidvania platformer with the same name for the ZX Spectrum about a man called Virgil who was decapitated, and now he must wander through his own purgatory in search of his true head and perhaps eternal rest. Take your chances with this little metroidvania game.

name: Virgil's Purgatory EX
summary: Virgil's Purgatory EX is an expanded port of the ZX Spectrum version of the game for the MSX, with an updated level design, two new areas, an extra boss, and much more.

name: Violet Storm
summary: Neon space shooter arcade.

name: Vilde
summary: Vilde is a Norse myth-inspired roguelite FPS. Procedurally generated levels and RPG elements. Battle resurrected foes, earn boons, and permanently upgrade your character. Join 4-player co-op or play alone in a dark and epic world inspired by Norse mythology and Viking culture

name: V is for Vortex
summary: V is for Vortex is a simple but addicting puzzle game. After waking up in a strange testing facility you find yourself thrust into a series of bizarre tests with only your wits, and a strange gun by your side. V is for Vortex ships with 18 fun levels that will challenge your mind and bend the rules of space. Can you beat every level?

name: Village & Monsters
summary: Village & Monsters is a card game that challenges you to develop a human settlement as well as viruses. The settlement is periodically attacked by monsters, but the monster population is held back by a virus. The goal of the game is to reach a population of 100 people and not let the virus die.

name: Victory Zone: Real Pachinko Simulator
summary: Victory Zone is a Miscellaneous game, developed by SCEJ and published by SCEI, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Virtual WarZone
summary:
Pilot a Next Generation Tank with 3-D HUD!

You are a tank commander remote piloting a future generation tank in the year 2179. Unknown enemy forces have attacked and turned your country into a WarZone! Using a red laser based heads-up display (HUD), your tank gives you see-through armor capabilities, while allowing you to pilot from a remote fortified location. Your objective is to stay alive and hunt down enemy AI powered sentry towers, tanks, and helicopters.

You navigate your tank using your onboard radar and compass. Two primary weapons are at your fingertips: a machine gun and a BFG. Use your machine gun wisely or it overheats. Your BFG packs a bigger punch but takes time to reload. Aim carefully and always be on the lookout for enemies that are constantly hunting you!

Good luck commander.

name: Video Editor's Toolkit
summary: Take on the role of Mark Brown and edit the GMTK video of the best games of this year's jam! Watch out though, because the video editing software is misbehaving a bit today... it may get a bit puzzly!

name: Viridian Sage
summary: Enter the magical Kingdom of Riki! Through generations, mages have come to Riki to study the Sage, the essence of existence. Through this study, research, and experimentation great and terrible magics have risen and fallen. When this Kingdom falls under attack you and your friends must save it!

name: Vicarious Reality
summary: Vicarious Reality is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. It was inspired by an abandoned retro-themed project by MagicMaha.

name: Viking Hiking
summary: Viking Hiking is a cheerful 3D Platformer. Join Bøf on his adventure to reach Valhalla. Jump, dash and use the horn as you explore a lush but challenging island! Viking Hiking is a FREE game made by second year students from Breda University.

name: Vicious Star: Kill All
summary: "Vicious Star" is an engaging turn-based strategy game, thrusting you into the role of a village guardian fighting intense battles. Within the game, you'll assemble your team, mixing and matching various characters and runes, and deploying unique skills to obliterate the monsters menacing your home.

name: Vigor
summary: Vigor is a vanilla compatible megawad with a focus on fast and frantic gameplay. Inspired by E.M's "Gotta Go Fast," Vigor is Scythe styled by design, a good number of the maps on display were made within a short period of time and feature tight, punchy gameplay.

name: Video Pinball
summary:
It's the world's first video game to simulate the action and color of pinball... in a compact cabinet size.

Through the magic of mirrors, video images of the ball, flippers and drop targets are superimposed on an actual 3-dimensional blacklight playfield.

name: Viral Fear
summary: Step into the shoes of a daring live streamer in Viral Fear, a spine-chilling 1 to 4 player co-op adventure. Stealthily maneuver through the woods, destroy ritual skulls, and unravel the secrets of the cult to vanquish the nightmarish entity.

name: Vinebound: Tangled Together
summary: Vinebound: Bloom & Boom is a tasty mix of horde-survival roguelite and chaotic couch co-op for 1-2 players. Coordinate your position, synchronize attacks, and defeat hordes of moldy foes while unlocking new arsenals to cultivate plantastic builds.

name: Vipertrace
summary: Fight for survival! Industrial waste has disturbed the dangerous Kaeru-tori's habitat, forcing them into the city. Unlock new areas, purchase weapons and upgrades to grow stronger, and fight off the horde with your friends!

name: Victoria 3: Melodies for the Masses Music Pack
summary: Victoria 3 has a new music pack inspired by the romantic yearnings for those simpler days of working on the land. This nearly hour long collection of original music is a concert honoring the daily struggles and ambitions of the common people.

name: Victoria 3: Sphere of Influence
summary: In a more civilized age, the pen is supposed to be mightier than the sword. The first major expansion for Victoria 3 increases the depth and immersion of the diplomatic game. Build Power Blocs to protect regional interests, invest in foreign economies and interfere in your subjects' politics.

name: Victoria 3: Dawn of Wonder
summary: From the glory of the sunrise to the glow of the gas lamp, this Art Pack takes the theme of light and shadow to add new life to the visual experience. A day-night cycle marks the time you spend in game, and other images shine with new life as the dawn of a new age is reflected in the art itself.

name: Victoria 3: American Buildings Pack
summary: In many ways, the 19th century was the American Century - continental expansion, rapid population growth, and the stirring of an overseas empire. This pack includes unique building models for the United States, special American designs for other structures and the American Capitol Building as a landmark.

name: Violence
summary: A four map short episode based around the colour purple. Meant to be a nice relaxing "sit back and play Doom" set.

name: Village Life: Love, Marriage and Babies
summary: Start your family today!

name: Violetshift
summary:
This is a collaborative set of 13 Boom-compatible (-cl9) levels made from and inspired by Stardate 20x7. Proto-slaughter, tight skirmishes, casual combat, and various puzzlery await, all splotched with purple for the eyes to feast on. This is a mix of short void vignettes and extensive gothic/cavernous menageries, so maybe there's something for everyone here.
This set is comparable to late Sunlust, Fractured Worlds, and its very inspiration. Difficulty settings have been taken into account, and we've done our best to make HNTR/HMP enjoyable experiences while still being somewhat challenging.

name: Vila do Nevoeiro R.E.L.I.D.O
summary: Vila do Nevoeiro R.E.L.I.D.O is an psychological horror game that tells the story of Adam, who has recently moved to the strange Nevoeiro Village shortly after divorcing his wife, and his son, Charles, who has mysteriously disappeared in the midst of a distorted world. Desperately, Adam searches for Charles, not knowing if he is dreaming or going insane.

name: Victory at Sea Atlantic
summary: "Victory at Sea Atlantic" transports you to the cold, unforgiving waters of the Atlantic Theatre in WWII. With a vast array of ships, planes, and subs, engage in epic sea battles & secure your place in history. Victory At Sea Atlantic is the ultimate naval warfare experience.

name: Virtual Vixens
summary: Save your friend from the evil Crystal who has imprisoned him in a VR pleasure world for his failure to please her. Before you can reach Crystal you must satisfy three beautiful women and solve the mystery of their strange erotic existence.

name: Vivid's Hot Slots
summary:
The Future...

You've set your coordinates for the Hagar System. Word has it that after the sexual holocaust, Admiral James escaped the Garion Asylum to establish a world designed in his new image. A world dictated by sexual pleasure and exitement.

Lord Stevos has ordered you to locate Admiral James and negotiate his return to Earth. Be aware that James has created the ultimate sexual machine hot slots, which is run by his evil assistant Rothman. A machine so erotic, those sent before you have never returned.

Prepare yourself now and launch your probe into Vivid World and hot slots!

Featuring Janine, Ashlyn Gere, Nikki Dial, Lené, Heather Hunter and all your Vivid favorites.

Including spectacular 3-D graphics and original music, custom video footage, erotic game play, and much more!

name: Virtual Pro-Wrestling 2: Freem Edition
summary: Virtual Pro-Wrestling 2: Freem Edition is a hack of AKI Corporation's Virtual Pro-Wrestling 2 on the Nintendo 64. The hack replaces various default VPW2 wrestlers with other wrestlers, most of whom have been in other AKI wrestling games

name: Vine Mapping Contest 2016
summary: The Vine Mapping Contest 2016 was an event organized by Joel "Vargskelethor" Johannson of the Vinesauce streaming team. The terms were simple: make a WAD with up to three maps, playable in ZDoom or GZDoom.

name: Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy
summary: Welcome to "Viking Chef: Feast Frenzy", a captivating 3D cooking adventure set in the heart of the old North. Assume the role of a Viking Chef and dive headfirst into the culinary chaos of a bustling Norse kitchen. Your mission? To serve the gods a feast of legendary proportions.

name: Vivaion
summary: Vivaion is a next-generation battle royale & open-world MMORPG. Players can explore, fight, craft, level up & collect rare items scattered across the universe.

name: Villa de la Muerte
summary: This was a map originally made for a vaguely spain/syringe inspired project but, decided after some time to release on its own.

name: Visions of Evil
summary: Enter a haunted world in Visions of Evil, a 4v1 asymmetrical PvP Horror game. Explore abandoned areas with your team, battle hellish entities, and use ancient weapons and artifacts to survive and banish the evil. Are you ready to face your fears?

name: Virago: Reality New
summary: Virago: Reality New invites you to a chilling adventure where you guide Willow, a survivor escaping abuse, through a world of terror. Master the torchlight, outwit relentless stalkers, and navigate between reality and nightmare. Can you ensure Willow's survival in this heart-pounding pursuit?

name: Violet
summary: You woke up in a Forest's Cemetery, with no memory. Uncover the secrets, solve Riddles and Puzzles in a Psychological Thriller based on the Classic Survival Horror Games that you liked best in the 90's with Modern Over the Shoulder angles. From the same creator of Trauma Broken Paradise.

name: Viral
summary: Stylized sci-fi FPS shooter

name: Vigilante Racer
summary: Race across walls, ceilings, and cloud-piercing tracks in a world where sci-fi hover tech rules. Test gravity extremes in The Pit, be the hero in City racing by stopping criminals and bring speed to another level in Skyway. Follow a story for the first chapter's release.

name: Vilzam: Cosmic Struggle
summary: Developed by Yuichi Toyama. Won Second place of the Login Magazine programming contest. Listing was published in the December 1985 magazine.

name: Vikings: Valhalla
summary:
Earn your place among the gods in this strategy game based on the hit series. Build your settlement and lead raids against rivals to become a legend.
Ready to immerse yourself in the world of Vikings: Valhalla?
Prove your might in PvP battles, build and upgrade your settlement, recruit and lead your warband on raids against rivals for resources, riches and glory. Defend your settlement from enemy attacks and take part in campaign battles to progress through an original story inspired by the hit Netflix series!

name: Vivid World
summary: A follow-up to the hit game Vivid Knight, Vivid World is a completely new party-building, roguelike strategy game! Our story takes place in the Netherworld, a land ruled by demons. Utilize and master our protagonist, Lemuria's new Jewel Magic to conquer strange dungeons.

name: Village
summary: A young boy has come to a distant village to visit his grandmother. Arriving at the final station, in some wilderness, we find newspaper clippings on the platform. This is where our tangled story begins.

name: Virtual Love Secrets
summary: A visual novel a little unusual, which not only the decisions you make change the course, but each game will be personal.

name: Viking Survival
summary: Embark on an epic Viking saga, standing as the last line of defense against marauding orcs. Guide your hero through wild storms, wielding a magical axe to safeguard your tribe and territory. Uncover hidden treasures within ancient chests and crates, fortifying your journey with vital resources.

name: Visco Collection
summary: With the Visco Collection, you'll have the chance to relive the glory days of arcade gaming with these seven fantastic titles. Whether you're a fan of shooters, fighters, sports, or racing games, there's something here for everyone.

name: Viki Spotter: Complete Bundle
summary: This is a set of puzzle games from the Viki Spotter series that will bring out all your attention.

name: Virtual Mom: Job Simulator Manager
summary: You are a true superhero, balancing between raising children and a successful career. You'll have to overcome numerous challenges, starting from the moment the morning sun rises...

name: Vicky Adventure Shanghai
summary:
Victoria finds in his grandfather archeologist's attic an old map and a note to this map, which describes how to find the lost Atlantis! Victoria offers his friend Steve a journey in search of Atlantis!
You go to the most exciting journey you can only imagine, along with Victoria and her friend Steve. Victoria and Steve's adventure story covers 5 continents of the earth and has 5 series (a sequel). Each story has its own unique level and a special game play. The very first trip is to the distant city of Shanghai

name: Vivaland: Dream House
summary: Dream House serves as a prologue, showcasing the Build Mode of Vivaland, and it will be a free-to-play game. Up to eight players can claim lots in the town of Vivaland and can build houses in single-player mode or visit their friend’s lot and build together.

name: Viscous Realms
summary: Viscous Realms is a large Boom-format hell map that is themed around three of OTEX's liquids: blood, goop, and lava.

name: VikingScape
summary: A viking themed puzzle/escaperoom.

name: Virtual VCS
summary:
An unreleased Atari 2600 game compilation for the Atari Jaguar. It contains:

-Combat
-Pac Man
-Adventure
-Yar's Revenge
-Defender
-Berzerk

name: Vital Bracelet Arena
summary: A companion app for the Vital Bracelet, Vital Bracelet BE and Vital Hero virtual pet. Players can fight in online battles, send characters on adventures to locate items, archive thwir characters and raise their stats.

name: Virtuar Z
summary: A sci-fi Third Person Shooter with a background in the Indonesian city of Jakarta in the future, city full of conflict, Neo Jakarta 2150 once familiar city of Jakarta has been destroyed by civil war, The law of the jungle applies.

name: Violent Rumble
summary: Community mapping event organized at 4chan's retro videogame board: 11 large levels including a start map and a secret map, following a variety of styles and texture themes. They run on a custom mod that combines enemies, weapons, items and assets from both official mission packs, Quoth, Arcane Dimensions, RMQ and Progs_dump. As such, it comes with many new models, sounds as well as skyboxes and custom music tracks.

name: Virtual Families 3: Our Country Home
summary: Virtual Families 3: Our Country Home is a new way to play! Now a premium experience with no micro transactions to buy!

name: Vivaldia 2
summary: Pitted against relentless robotic foes and navigating through dense and perilous jungles, scorching lava fields, and treacherous swamps, Vivaldia once again seems faced with an impossible challenge.   With the fate of the land in her hands – will Vivaldia rise to the occasion?

name: Vindictive Drive 2: Maidbot Archive
summary: Build Robot Maids to battle massive robots! Try to contain the massive invasion as you unveil a dark story of revenge. Go to the Wagie Cage, where Wagie(that's her name) will build them for you. The Maidbots are voiced by professional Anime dub, videogame and TV/Film VAs.

name: Vice City Race
summary: Welcome to the world of speed and adrenaline, welcome in Vice City Race!

name: Vinecard
summary: A Roguelike game with action card style. Explore divine weapons on the Kochab Star, slay demons and eliminate demons, solve mechanism puzzles, and cultivate to the pinnacle of perfection.

name: Villa Escape
summary: Escape room game set in a medieval village in Castile and its old mysteries that remain hidden to this day. A puzzle game to test your intellect and intuition.

name: Virtual Rides 3: Northstar
summary: A new ride was spotted at the Virtual Rides 3 fairground. The new ride "Northstar" gives its visitors a wild and unique ride with high G-forces.

name: Virtual Rides 3: Roundtrip
summary: New showman arrived! Discover the new ride "Roundtrip" that has moved into a new part of town and let yourself be whirled through the air! This ride is a true classic and must not be missed on any good funfair!

name: Virtual Rides 3: Bounce Machine
summary: Description is not setThe "Bounce Machine" is a particularly exciting ride. Get your visitors excited with various movement programs that send them on a special adrenaline rush - including pneumatic hissing.

name: Virtual Rides 3: The Falcon
summary: New showman arrived! Discover the new ride "The Falcon" that has moved in to the newest part of the fairground. Enjoy this new thrilling ride!

name: Virtual Rides 3: Flipping Disc
summary: New showman arrived! Discover the new ride "Flipping Disc", which has been introduced in the newest part of the fairground and let yourself be whirled through the air! This ride is a true classic and should not be missing at any good funfair!

name: Virtual Rides 3: Astronaut
summary: The "Astronaut" is a very special ride. Unique on the fairgrounds of this world. Control 3 motors to send your passengers on a very special adrenalin rush.

name: Virtual Rides 3: Salsa
summary: New showman arrived! Discover the new ride "Salsa" that has moved into the newest part of town and do some rounds in this classic ride!

name: Virtual Rides 3: Forge
summary: A new ride was spotted at the Virtual Rides 3 fairground. The new ride "Forge" is located at an idyllic lake in the lower part of the city forest and gives its visitors a wild ride with high G-forces. And the whole thing upside down.

name: Virtual Rides 3: Ultimate Edition
summary: This bundle contains the base game "Virtual Rides 3" and all the DLCs. You can use this bundle to just complete your set.

name: Violet Kingdom
summary: A single player RPG adventure

name: Victoria 3: Colossus of the South
summary: Rich in culture and resources, South America enters the Victorian Age. Many challenges await nations newly freed from European dominance. Stake your claim on the future of the Southern Hemisphere in Colossus of the South, a new Region Pack for Victoria 3.

name: Vicarious
summary: Vicarious is a limit-removing wad for Doom 2 set in a medieval city. It's mostly inspired visually by the Elden Ring Trailer that came out some time around last year, as well as Scythe 2 and @Egg Boy's Cold Front.

name: Visual novel for the kids: Lumi And Baby - Hamster And Baby Dragon
summary: Read an interactive bedtime story with your children, a tale of a positive hamster called Lumi and his friend a baby dragon. Lumi and Baby lost their homes and all the animals in the forest help them. Made for children aged 5-8.

name: Village Tycoon: Farm City Simulator
summary: Village Tycoon: Farm City Simulator is a fun and addictive farming simulation game that challenges players to develop their farming capabilities and turn their small village into a bustling metropolis. With beautiful and fun buildings, expansions, and a variety of crops to grow, players must manage their farmfields, produce goods, and deliver orders to their citizens and neighbors to keep them happy and earn cash and XP.

name: Vitrified
summary: Vitrified is a post-apocalyptic metroidvania where progress depends on teamwork with your robot pal ALAN. Explore a mysterious mutant wasteland and upgrade ALAN with abilities to unlock new areas.

name: Video Poker
summary:
A 5-card poker game for Arduboy ported from the Gamebuino version.

During the bet round, use Up or Down to increase or decrease your bet. The minimum bet is $5 and the maximum is $100. Press B to deal the cards. Select cards using Left or Right. Press A to toggle Hold on the selected card. Press B to exchange unheld cards for new ones from the deck.

name: Virtuous
summary: Virtuous is an immersive, action-adventure RPG. Acquire all the virtues! Embark on quests, fight with your sword, bow and shield, or use them to solve puzzles. Explore wonderful worlds, ride boats, horse wagons, gondolas. Learn about different Saints and Angels from their icons or statues, and more.

name: Vispire
summary: A collection of fast, fun old-school maps with varying difficulty levels.

name: Virar
summary: Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world full of zombies, live an intense story of survival and face implacable hordes in this fast-paced game of action and strategy.

name: Virtualis World
summary:
Virtualis is a new Play-to-Earn game where people can work in buildings as employees and earn USDT working, playing the game with PvP Battles, selling on Marketplace their NFTs and much more.

In the world of virtualis there are different cities with different structures. You will be able to choose your departure city upon your first log in, but you will still be able to navigate between them very easily.

name: Vigaro Runner
summary: Player is Vigaro pill and his mission is to avoid traps and use platforms to find star and finish levels

name: Visual Pinball X
summary: Visual Pinball X is an open source freeware pinball game for PC.

name: Visual Pinball VR
summary: A port of Visual Pinball X to VR.

name: Virus 91
summary: Virus 91 is an adventure game with first-person shooter (FPS) elements. You have to take on the role of a sergeant and go to the laboratory, in which all the equipment is out of control. Explore mysterious locations and find out who is behind this whole situation!

name: Vivarium
summary: You wake up and find yourself in an enormous terrarium. Explore, meet characters, and grow your escape - and along the way, uncover the mysteries of the terrarium as well. Vivarium is an adventure game about finding where you belong while surviving in a familiar yet alien environment.

name: Visions of Mana
summary: For the first time in over 15 years, a brand-new entry in the mainline Mana series arrives! Embark on a new adventure with Val, the newly appointed soul guard, as he sets off on a journey across the world to accompany his friend on her pilgrimage to the Tree of Mana. Experience action-packed gameplay and explore a vibrant semi-open 3D field, encountering fearsome foes and unlikely allies along the way.

name: Visit From Above
summary: Visit From Above is a sit-and-survive horror game (inspired by Five Nights at Freddy's) that puts you face to face with aliens. You will have to survive 3 nights using different methods to defeat the aliens including a flashlight, turning power on/off, and closing your eyes (pretend to sleep).

name: Virtual Valerie
summary:
She's your cybernetic fantasy!
You've got a hot date with Valerie! Explore Val's "virtual world" and learn the true meaning of the term cybererotica!

An intuitive point-and-click interface makes Virtual Valerie virtually yours to play with. She's your cybernetic fantasy and you control the action! Hilarious rip-roaring entertainment in a sexploration adventure!

name: Virtual Valerie 2
summary:
"Virtual Valerie gunned her Ram-Hog down the Infobahn, avoiding cybercops and the netsex police, but she still had time to turn a tele-trick or two."

Virtual Valerie 2 is the sequel to Virtual Valerie. VV2 features 3D graphics, more erotic scenarios, more sounds, and a higher level of interactivity.

name: Vincent: Phantom of the G4
summary: The original game that later served as inspiration for the creation of Vincent: The Secret of Myers.

name: Visions of Eternity
summary: Visions of Eternity is an episode for Ultimate Doom. There is also a PDF booklet with additional information and trivia about the episode.

name: Vic Nibbler
summary: Vic Nibbler is a new game made in 2019 for the Commodore Vic 20 computer with a 3K RAM expansion.

name: Virtual Girl @ World's End
summary: A visual novel developed by HEADLOCK about Virtual YouTubers in an apocalyptic world.

name: Virtue
summary: A customizable event display for collider experiments for desktop or virtual reality. Explore electron-proton collisions in the ePIC detector at the future Electron-Ion Collider, or upload your own detector geometry and collision data to be animated.

name: Virtual girl save virtual boy
summary: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: Virtu-Pilot
summary: Get ready for take-off, cadet! Enter an immersive UE5 experience that will elevate your light aircraft procedure skills. Master preliminary checks, interior/exterior startup checks, and gain the confidence to soar. Planned features: AI instructors, multiplayer and radio communications training.

name: Visagens
summary: Visagens is an action-focused, 2D side-scroller shooter. Ispired by games like Sunset Riders and Castlevania. Play as Bento, a blind cowboy, armed with a mysterious gun and supernatural powers. In a quest to Cleanse the lands from the demonic scourge of the Visagens and avenge his family.

name: Vivian and Kyuma
summary: A short visual novel featuring elements inspired by the Princess and the Frog with a cultivation twist. Spend time with a cute little snake and have some fun together as you make decisions to determine the fate of a young goddess.

name: Vincent the Vampire
summary: Vincent the Vampire is part cathartic animated story and part point and click adventure. Talk to the locals and collect and combine items to solve puzzles as you travel through this unique world.

name: Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Jigsaw puzzles based on photos of beautiful landscapes.

name: Vividred Operation: Akane to Mayo-tto Operation!
Video Hustler
summary: With an overhead view of the table, you play a billiards variant called "Pocket Ball" with just six object balls. Imprecise control over the aim and velocity of your shots. You'll discover the exicetiment of ball colliding. The silence and concentration of the billiard room, as well as the enthusiasm of the players will all be there for you.

name: Vigour
summary: Vigour is a Puzzle Platformer game. This cute bird must solve puzzles with different mechanics in the levels. 30 differently designed levels, will you be able to pass all the puzzles? Complete the levels by solving different puzzles in each season.

name: Vivat Sloboda
summary: In minigame Vivat Sloboda, players will experience the period of the Velvet Revolution from the point of view of a taxi driver of the state taxi service, who accepts orders from staunch party officials, but also from students demanding change. Players will thus hear vastly different opinions.

name: Virus Kombat
summary: A deadly virus is decimating the world's population and you are the only one who can stop this threat. Run around the scene collecting the necessary ingredients to produce the vaccine, after that, eliminate the virus and save the population, can you do it?

name: Victor's Test Night
summary:
Victor's Test Night is a first-person adventure game.
You have to explore each museum by day and by night, and find and report on anomalies not seen by day.
The game lasts 5 days, but it's actually 5 minutes and 55 seconds.

name: Viking Frontiers
summary: Survival of your people - that's the only thing that matters. Become the leader of a newly founded Viking settlement and lead it to safety and glory. Gather, build, craft, hunt, raid and follow your Gods to endure hardships of nature and save your clan from violent destruction.

name: Viking Heroes 5
summary: Embark on a festive journey as the vikings prepare for Yule! Amidst enchanting festivities, the Viking siblings discover Odin has lost control over the threads of fate, prompting a mysterious journey throughout the famous realms of the nine worlds.

name: Virtua Striker 2 Version '98
summary: Virtua Striker 2 Version '98 is an expanded version of Virtua Striker 2 for Sega Model 3 arcade hardware. Version '98 has the same number of teams as the orignial (26), but changes some of the countries.

name: Virtua Striker 2 Version '99
summary: Virtua Striker 2 Version '99 is an expanded version of Virtua Striker 2 for Sega Model 3 arcade hardware. Version '99 adds a further three teams to the Version '98 roster, bringing the total to 29.

name: Virtua Striker 2 Ver. 2000
summary: Virtua Striker 2 Ver. 2000 is an expanded version of Virtua Striker 2. This version contained significant changes compared to the prior expansions, as it ran on the more capable Sega NAOMI arcade hardware, rather than Sega Model 3. Ver. 2000 adds a further five normal teams to the Version '99 roster and a third secret team, bringing the total to 35.

name: Vinceworld
summary: Vinceworld is a 1998 compilation of 30 experimental animations and interactive quizzes by Vince Collins.

name: Vibrant World Adventure
summary: The Vibrant World Adventure is a full conversion mod for Blade and Sorcery, utilizing HuJohner's Quest Framework to turn the game into a full-scale, RPG-style, open-world adventure with ~8 hours of gameplay content! This mod has a long list of mod requirements, ensuring that the player has plenty of places to see, people to meet, treasures to find, and mysteries to solve.

name: Virus Rush
summary: Infectious challenge in microscopic world!

name: Visca's Earth Conquest
summary: A sidescrolling sextroidvania shtomp-em-up where you play as an alien girl with the power to absorb objects and grow larger!

name: Visiting Shrine at Night
summary: A horror walking simulator where you just go from left to right through the shrine at night. If you spot something unusual, go back to the left. If there is no problem, please proceed to the right.

name: Vita: Rift of a Nation
summary: Follow Naysa-Dae. An Earth Vita, as she discovers what freedom is, fights to keep it and free the nation of Opolo. Be the rift that the world of Atria will never forget.

name: Vignettes: The Dream City
summary: Vignettes: The Dream City is a first-person surreal dream-crawler game featuring turn-based combat, knowledge-based gameplay, non-linear exploration, and souls-like progression. Your dreams are haunted by a strange city, and you feel supernaturally drawn to explore it. What will you find within?

name: Video Game
summary: Video Game is a local-multiplayer action arcade game. Curve the ball past your opponents and dash to save a goal at the last second!

name: Village Dealer

name: Virus
summary:
Never did like office parties...

Christmas eve, and the staff at Macrobiology Industries Limited were having the usual office party, with all the usual hi-jinx and tears, but something very unusual was happening in the biohazard containment fridge. The predicted pandemic had never occurred, and so the fridge was full of unused swine-flu vaccines, but that night it jostled for space with the secretary's cucumber sandwiches and the boss's - sorry, not his, a friends - Viagra supply, all stored there for safe keeping until the party really got started. But the disco lights overloaded the generator, the fuses blew, the fridge shut off, and the staff all went their separate ways home to sleep off the excesses.

January 2nd, happy new year! The security guard, first on site that morning, was slowly working his way around the offices and labs, tripping the fuse boxes back to life. He shook his head, bemused by the broken hinges on the doors, but the smashed containment fridge, and mucus-like stains on the walls and floor scared him enough to grab his SHARPS pistol, as strange things moved just out of sight...

name: Viper-V6
summary:
Viper V-6 is the first in the long-running Viper series of animated adult games. It contains three separate stories:The Devil Came* tells the story of a teenager named Ogawa, who was unpopular in his class and summoned a demon to exact revenge. But the demon turned out to be female, so his wishes naturally assume a different direction...

Afternoon describes a scene during a beauty contest. The defeated participant thinks that she was unfairly judged, but her fury at the winner turns, in front of the amazed spectators, into erotic desire...

Double Impact features two young female detectives, Miho and Kumi, who pretend to search for jobs as maids in order to infiltrate a mansion in which mysterious disappearances have been taking place.

All the three stories are very short and can perhaps be better described as "scenes"; the entire game can be completed within several minutes. The interaction is reduced to absolute minimum, with an occasion decision to make, and is available only in The Devil Came (in which it is also possible to die if the player makes a wrong decision); the two other stories are non-interactive, the only input being pressing the return key to advance to the next scene. What sets "Viper V-6" (and the whole series) apart from most other Japanese adult games - beside the "three stories in one" concept - is the fact that most of its sex scenes are animated.

name: Viper-V8
summary:
The second entry in Sogna's long-running Viper franchise, Viper V-8 has the same format as its predecessor: three separate short stories with minimal interaction and animated sex scenes.

The three stories are:Friday the 18th*: Obviously, a parody on horror movies, telling the story of three young girls who were sexually assaulted by mysterious masked men when camping near a forest.

Demon's Night is set in medieval times and describes a battle of three young heroes against a vicious demon. One of them is killed in battle, while the other (a girl) is captured by the demon; the remaining warrior, a young man named Ryu, has to rescue his friend.

Alien Wars takes place in the future. A young space pilot named Sylvie is ambushed and captured by aliens who have nothing else in mind but to have sex with her...

There is some rudimentary interaction in all the three stories: "Friday the 18th" allows the player to switch from one heroine to another (even though there is only one correct way to do that); "Demon's Night" has a scene with pseudo-RPG turn-based combat (pre-determined results); both "Demon's Night" and "Alien Wars" offer some menu-based choices to make, some of which will lead to Game Over.

Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. takes the gameplay of Virtua Fighter 5 and raises it to new levels! Rollback Netcode support, gorgeous 4K visuals and additional content make it the best version of this legendary game ever.

The legendary fighting series makes its Steam debut with Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O.! Challenge the greatest fighters in the world in the ultimate remaster of the classic 3D fighter,now featuring Rollback netcode support, gorgeous 4K graphics, and all the bone-crunching, martial arts combat of the renowned original. Battle through classic VF modes like Arcade or Rank Match, create your own custom online tournaments and leagues with up to 16 players, or learn from the best in Spectator Mode. Virgo Versus the Zodiac is a sci-fi/fantasy JRPG inspired by the Mario & Luigi RPG series and the Mother RPG series in which you play as an obsessed villain.

The game features traditional turn-based combat with real-time execution of moves: blocking, countering and timing your attacks carefully as well as predicting your foes' moves is essential to succeed in Virgo’s twisted and unforgiving cosmic quest to bring back the Golden Age, a period of peace, symmetry and balance, or so she thinks.

summary: Immerse yourself in the world of the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time. Explore mysterious places by point-and-click and face challenges that will test your wits.

name: Virtual Girl: Sex Simulator VR
summary: Customize every moment with over 200 body animations and 100 facial expressions. With realistic HDRP graphics and full VR support, dive into a world of passion and connection like never before. Whether on PC or in Virtual Reality, this is your chance to create your perfect experience.

name: Violeta
summary: After feeling marginalized by society, a young trans woman decides to venture out into the post-apocalyptic world to find a place she can call home.

name: Village Meow
summary: Play as Kiti who was a city cat that moved into Village Meow after Kiti’s owner died. Now Kiti is in debt by the local corrupted Mayor, Bos Oyen, after being tricked. Kiti has a choice to either pay off his debts or unite with other villagers to drive out Bos Oyen.

name: Videophobia
summary: You are in a room without windows or doors. The TV dimly illuminates the room. What is this, a box? How to open it? After solving the riddle, you find the TV remote control. Click... a door appeared. You step into the darkness and hear laughter... turn around and find out what's behind the screen.

name: Viking Days Remaster
summary: Face the domestic life of the fine upstanding viking in 17 mini challenges.

name: Vida
summary: Vida was Conada Soft 's first major project created in DIV. It is set on Mars and was originally going to have a final chapter on Earth, but it was scrapped.

name: Viande Crue
summary: VIANDE CRUE (Raw meat) is a narrative-driven game. You visit a 3D handcrafted world, discovering bits of stories about a dog and his family.

name: Vision Crew's Deltarune: Alternate Chapters
summary:
Vision Crew's Deltarune: Alternate Chapters is a fangame project aiming to interpret Toby Fox's earlier concepts and Chapters, it's entirely speculative and plans to be worked on even once his own content is out!

It includes familiar characters, even ones Toby has namedropped without a design... or vice versa! But you'll also meet a ton of brand new characters!

name: Virgin Simulator
summary: Virgin wants to find a girlfriend

name: ViCrew
summary: A tactical RPG with turn-based combat in which you build a crew of Vikings to go on glorious raids.

name: Visions of Mana: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Visions of Mana: Digital Deluxe Edition is Square Enix's premium bundle of the latest mainline Mana series action RPG, featuring the full game plus exclusive cosmetic content celebrating the franchise's legacy.

Digital Deluxe Edition Content:
Visions of Mana Full Game

Mana Superstars Costume Set:
FINAL FANTASY ADVENTURE: Sumo Outfit (Val)
Secret of Mana: Popoi Outfit (Julei)
Trials of Mana: Riesz Outfit (Careena)
Legend of Mana: Elazul Outfit (Morley), Lady Blackpearl Outfit (Palamena)

Mana Series BGM Bundle:
A collection of 26 background music tracks spanning the entire Mana franchise, including selections from FINAL FANTASY ADVENTURE, Secret of Mana, Trials of Mana, Legend of Mana, Children of Mana, Dawn of Mana, Heroes of Mana,﻿ and Rise of Mana﻿.

name: Victorian Deathbed Simulator
summary: Three beloved (though distant) relatives will visit, intending to pay their final respects. Choose wisely! One of them will be the beneficiary of your Enormous Fortune...

name: Vice: Magic City Mayhem
summary: Vice: Magic City Mayhem is a retro action-adventure game where you fight, collect new items, and upgrade your character as you make your way through bustling nightclubs, scenic beaches, and raptor-infested yachts.

name: Vida
summary: In a future where memories are the last connection to a lost humanity, you are an advanced AI exploring fragments of past lives. Understand emotions, traumas, and choices in a journey to uncover what it means to be alive.

name: Video Game Grid
summary: Browser-based video game trivia with daily 3x3 puzzles to solve and share results. Powered by IGDB.

name: Vignettes
summary: Vignettes (vee·nyets) presents numerous dream sketches for you to explore. Scenes from the past, spaces lost in time, times lost in space. Reach inner peace and complete your dream diary.

name: Victim.exe
summary: This executable, named "victim", was found in the deep corners of the internet. It contained a severely corrupted maze game. Though there are many, only one level of this game was able to be shared, as the other half-corrupted levels were not safe for viewing and caused multiple seizures to the people recovering them. Almost 20 audio files were also removed as most were too disturbing for listening, including a 32-minute-long file of several children screaming.

name: Vital Bracelet Digital Monster
summary:
The Vital Bracelet Digital Monster, Vital Bracelet Digivice-V-, and Vital Hero all require Dim Cards to load Digimon for gameplay. Each Dim Card comes with a maximum of 17 Digimon, arranged into a themed evolution tree.
They are all a wearable Virtual Pet watch, and the strap color is based on which model of the device you buy.

name: Virtual Knee Surgery
summary: This site takes the children’s game, Operation, to an entirely new level. Snap on your gloves, and play doctor as you perform surgery under expert direction.

name: Virtual Interactive Fireplace
summary: A cozy, retro-inspired hearth to warm your screen and your spirit.

name: Virtuále: Heist Simulations
summary: A turn-based heist game where you get to mastermind your own high-profile job. This game’s rich atmosphere and sense of style underpin the simple but fun strategy gameplay. Sneak, hack, and smash your way to riches in Virtuále: Heist Simulations!

name: Virion
summary: A sci-fi action roguelike with frenetic combat including ranged, melee and dodging

name: Vigaro Runner 2: Return
summary: Vigaro pill is back. Solve and finish 15 different themed levels and find yellow star in this 3d platformer

name: Victory of Seeker
summary: An unprecedented Moba game that can compete in 4 teams.(3v3v3v3) Choose a sucker, build buildings, collect money, train, attack, loot and destroy enemy buildings, do everything to get richer than your rival. Relax with many mini-games that you can play and laugh with 8 friends at the same time.

name: Videoclub Simulator
summary: Manage your own video store in this management simulator. Sell movies, organize shelves, and attract customers in a nostalgic experience inspired by classic video rental stores.

name: Vive le Roi 3
summary:
«Vive le Roi 3» is a puzzle and anticipation game, without chance or timing, based on mini puzzles to be solved by choosing the right ladder on each floor to reach the king and save him from his executioner.

Inspired by the concept of labyrinths, the originality of «Vive le Roi 3» is to be able to modify the state of the active elements of the levels according to your choices.

The levels are made up of numerous obstacles, such as doors, monsters, moving guards, tunnels… They are also made up of multicolored switches allowing to invert the states of the obstacles in order to clear a path.

Crowns are placed at the end of the level and the player will have to collect them in order to collect all the cards of the kings of France.

This brain game features 1000 levels to resolve, 5296 crowns to collect and 66 French kings to discover.

The third opus has a richer narrative thanks to the history of France told through the 66 cards to collect.

Unlike previous «Vive le Roi» or even Limbo-like, the gameplay is mostly based on logic and anticipation concepts.

name: Viper Squad
summary: "Outsmart. Overload. Dominate." Viper Squad brings high-stakes strategy to a futuristic FPS. Build your squad, master unique classes, and experience the explosive Overload Mode. Your skills, your legacy, your battlefield. Add Viper Squad to your wishlist and change the game.

name: Vicious Circle
summary: Vicious Circle was a fighting game similar to Killer Instinct being developer by Atari Games. It was cancelled along with several other in development titles when Midway aquired Atari Games. The game would eventually leak online.

name: Viewtiful Joe
summary: The PlayStation 2 port of Viewtiful Joe adds an easier difficulty mode, Sweet, and a new playable character, Dante, from the Devil May Cry series.

name: Vietnam War
summary: Open world single-player FPS. Command your squad in battle across jungles, hills and villages of Vietnam. Fight as U.S or Vietcong. Vast arsenal of weapons and 50+ vehicles

name: Viquim
summary: Advergame for a Beer house company made in 2020

name: VIractal: World of Viractalia
summary: A strategic board game-style RPG where dice rolls guide your journey! Build your deck, explore changing maps, and face events shaped by your choices and luck. Play solo or online with friends—every adventure is a new experience!

name: Village Escape
summary:
"Village Escape" is a point-and-click 2D adventure with RPG elements where you have to solve puzzles and fight monsters to escape mystic village.

...You woke up in the cellar with a headache...
Your last memories is about being dragged to the cellar...
What happened? Have you been kidnapped?!...

Your quest is to explore the village, find clues, solve puzzles, open locks to advance your investigation. The game is a mixture of escape the room and classic quests.

name: Vikings Dynasty
summary: Embrace viking life and earn Valhalla’s blessing. Survive in the harsh norse environments and praise the Gods. Become a Jarl, control every aspect of your village and protect your community at all costs. Build and customize ships and explore the fjords in the unforgiving world of Vikings Dynasty.

name: Villages & Dungeons
summary: A hardcore roguelite card game where deck-building strategies are at the core of everything! With a vast array of cards, random dungeons, a wealth of encounter events, and diverse enemies, it awaits your exploration and challenge.

name: Victor's Test Night: Reves
summary: Victor’s Test: a trial of supernatural resistance. Guard the museum at night, spot artifact anomalies, and adapt as doors shift—triggering or erasing them. Welcome to Victor’s Test Night: Rêves.

name: Viceria
summary: Viceria is a minimalistic colony simulator. Build cities, develop your economy, build trade, defend your colony from threats and decide the fate of your people. Will you serve the metropolis or will you oppose it? It's up to you!

name: Viking Breaker
summary: Break through the walls of Hell and crush hordes of infernal creatures aboard your drakkar! Viking Breaker is an arcade roguelite mixing brick-breaker and bullet hell mechanics. Launch your shields, activate runes, and survive the trials of the Norse gods!

name: Village Tale
summary: A relaxing idle village-building simulator nestled in the corner of your screen! Build, Craft, and Trade to guide your village from humble beginnings to a thriving trading hub, it's time to write your own Village Tale!

name: Villainville
summary: Join the outcasts of Villainville in this cozy farming sim adventure, where Stardew valley meets Shrek. Grow magic crops, tame the tiny unicorns, sneak into the night market, and befriend misfit fairy tale characters. Bonus? Find the misery mushroom plague saboteur and redeem the unredeemable.

name: Viral Reload EX
summary: Viral Reload EX is a sci-fi shoot-em-up with a unique dash mechanic where you shrink down to fight infections at a microscopic scale! Can you defeat the evil Kyle Kaboom before he destroys the moon?

name: Videonauts
summary: Videonauts is a pixel art adventure game where you must escape from a mysterious mansion full of deadly traps and terrors. You and your fellow trapped companions want to escape alive... but how you converse and solve exploration-based puzzles can change everyone's fate!

name: Village Defenders
summary: Village Defenders – A thrilling pixel art 2D roguelike game where you strategize to protect your village from relentless waves of undead. Gain experience, unlock powerful abilities, and defend your home from monstrous invaders! Can you hold the line and save the village?

name: Vinterkyla: Shattered Realms
summary: A dynamic open-world RPG where your background shapes your story. Rule a tavern, lead a rebellion, or vanish into legend. In a world torn by betrayal and war, your choices reshape the fate of three fractured realms.

name: Virtual Skate
summary: Experience next level board control, skate with friends, and film insane tricks in the most immersive skateboarding game ever made.

name: Villain's Legacy 2
summary: After bringing his greatest invention to life, our superhero finds himself involved in an out-of-the-ordinary affair, so he will have to juggle fragile alliances and deadly threats. Between one adventure and another, of course, there will be a large dose of out-of-the-ordinary sex scenes!

name: Viewport: The A.R.K. Protocol
summary: Congratulations, Commander! You've been prematurely awakened from cryosleep to fix everything. Hope you like impossible odds, and pressing glowing buttons to decide who lives, dies, or gets spaced. Keep the ship running, the crew alive-ish, and the existential dread manageable.

name: Virtual Frenzy: Nexus Corps
summary: Virtual Frenzy: Nexus Corps is a free-to-play card game that fuses VTuber culture with strategy. Players build VTuber teams and battle in real-time using collectible card mechanics.

name: Vigil
summary: Vigil is a short Narrative Horror Game that takes place in an unsettling underground facility. Your job is to dispose of boxes, however, you’re not alone. A terrifying automaton roams the facility, moving only when you look away or when you blink in real life.

name: Virtual Hiryu Ver. 1.5
summary: Also called Virtual Mode in the West, with a Japanese complete name of Virtual Hiryuu no Ken 1.5, the game is a standard arcade fighting game with the option for 3D or 2D movement.

name: Virtual Chess
summary: VirtuaChess is the commercial version of the Écume and Cumulus 2 chess programs (which finished second in the blitz tournament in Munich and which tied 2nd/3rd in the 7th World Championships in Madrid). It runs on a PC with MS-DOS and can use all of the available memory for its hash tables. It has a splendid graphical interface written by the French firm Titus. Most of the chess engine is written in 32 bit assembler, and the program includes dynamic evaluation of king safety and pawn structure. It is based on PVS and uses null-move pruning. The program has perfect knowledge of KPK endgames. The evaluation function attempts to build plans whenever it recognizes important features in a position. VirtuaChess runs at 20,000 nodes per second on a Pentium 90.

name: Vibe Clicker
summary: An idle clicker game following the journey from job-seeking graduate to Vibe Lord. Click your way through career phases while automating tasks with increasingly "helpful" AI tools. Balance money, reputation, and processing power in this satirical exploration of AI's role in modern work.

name: Vivarium: Summer Vacay Update
summary: There will be 3 new animals, some tropical trees, beach figures and some special new features added to the game!

name: Viviparous Dumpling
summary: The object of Viviparous Dumpling is to maneuver the fetal dumpling with your mouse by grabbing moving and throwing him into the nutrient rich sperm that fill its mothers womb. But be sure to avoid the evil toxoplasm! four hits from them is all it takes to turn you into fetus soup.

name: Virtua Bowling
summary:
A 2D arcade bowling game developed and released by International Games System. Cabinets came in two styles: traditional joystick and buttons, or trackball.

Players must get a certain number of points in the first five frames to unlock the next five frames. Completing 10 frames with a good score unlocks Special mode, where groups of pins are set up in unique patterns and must be knocked down in a single throw.

Not to be confused with Ten Pin Alley for the Sony Playstation and Sega Saturn, whose Japanese release was also named Virtua Bowling.

name: Vintergard
summary: Explore the mysterious castle Vintergard. Solve puzzles and unravel the mystery of why you were brought here. Make critical choices that will decide the fate of the castle inhabitants, in this first person point and click adventure inspired by the classics.

name: Vibes
summary:
Vibes, the new Pudgy Penguins trading card game, brings together strategy and fun, perfect for newcomers to TCGs as well as experienced players. In Vibes, players create a custom “huddle” of quirky Penguin characters and augment it with bold Actions and powerful Relics. The goal? Outsmart your opponent to win the favor of Baron Fishpockets and claim victory.

To add even more excitement, each pack of Vibes trading cards includes QR codes that can be redeemed for free packs in the digital game, making it easy to build your collection across both formats.

Are you ready to join the Penguins and make your way to the top? Dive into Vibes and let the adventure begin!

name: Vital Shell
summary: Vital Shell is a single player top-down arena shooter that puts you in control of mechs inspired by classic fantasy archetypes. Unlock powerful synergies with unique weapons, traits, and abilities as you take on increasingly challenging waves of enemies in a shattered realm.

name: Viper Thunderground
summary: Viper Thunderground is a physics-based 2.5D helicopter precision platformer with vehicular combat and light puzzle elements. Take control of an armed helicopter, maneuver it through challenging levels and use its cannon and missiles to fight enemy security installations and numerous other obstacles.

name: Viking's Tavern
summary: A horde of vikings descends upon your tavern: so keep the ale flowing to quench their thirst. Move to the right row and click on your customer to send them a nice frothy pint, remembering to pick up the empties when they’re done. Be warned: some vikings like the beer more than others!

name: Vita: The Ember Oracle
summary: Dive into Vita: The Ember Oracle, where the city of Pando is torn by zealous dogma and a terrifying prophecy. Follow Sin-Nul's story of self-discovery and understanding of beliefs, as he fights to unravel a conspiracy threatening to destroy the Ever Flame.

name: Village Tale: Supporter Pack
summary:
If you are enjoying Village Tale and you want to support further development of the game (and future games) then the Supporter Pack is for you.

This pack includes multiple pets that roam around and make your village feels more alive.

name: Villa No. 1
summary: "Villa No. 1": A suspenseful puzzle game set in a mysterious villa. A grad takes a high-paying job there, uncovering hidden secrets of the enigmatic family and discovering the house's dark past. His soul is tested as he uncovers the truth.

name: Victim 10 PM
summary: Calling the emergency room on the 13th day of every month is no longer a good choice. The 911 emergency system has been hacked and turned into a human resource for a satanic doctor. Satan demands sacrifices and Dr. W, the devil's slave, ruthlessly offers innocent people as a gift to him.

name: Virtual Boxing
summary: A boxing game from Fuzhou Waixing that was released as cartridges for use with a proprietary Sunplus SPG288-based console to play the games on and wireless/wired peripherals.

name: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage
summary:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage takes the gameplay of Virtua Fighter 5 to new heights:

Rollback Netcode and Cross-play support let you take on any challenger, anywhere, across the globe in the most intense battles yet.

A brand-new single-player mode, ""World Stage"": Challenge powerful rivals on a solo quest to become the ultimate fighter

Enhanced replay functionality and improved training tools.

name: Vidalia's Adventure
summary: Vidalia's Adventure is a series of interactive vignettes, each with distinct procedurally generated soundscapes.

name: Video Game Bandle
summary: A version of Bandle using exclusively video game music.

name: Victory Banner
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of World War II in this real-time historical strategy game. Command a frontline company, make critical strategic decisions, and take direct control of any soldier or vehicle. Every decision comes at a price. What will be yours?

name: Virtual Crime Scene: Apartment 213
summary: An explorable 3D reconstruction of Jeffrey L. Dahmer’s apartment, recreated as it was on the night of his arrest. Developed using police reports, FBI files, crime scene photographs, and trial footage, the project serves as a digital preservation of a pivotal moment in American criminal history.

name: Vintage Pinball
summary: Vintage Pinball is a retro pinball game with great sounds and stunning graphics.

name: Video Game Tutorial
summary: Have you ever dreamed of a game, where each level demonstrates a separate video game genre, uncovering it's specific features with a litlle irony? Well, today is your lucky day.

name: Vice Thief Simulator: 80s Nostalgia
summary: Dive into the neon-lit 80s and become a cunning thief! Break into houses, steal valuables, hijack cars, and escape the cops. Upgrade your skills and gear to survive in a world where only the boldest criminals thrive.

name: Video Nightz
summary: It’s 1999 and Y2K is upon us. You are the owner of an independent video store that a corporation is eyeing off to purchase. Help your customers find the perfect video by listening to their stories and decide what the future is for your video store.

name: Virtual Taekwondo
summary:
Virtual Taekwondo (VTKD) is a VR combat game that transcends physical limitations. By leveraging advanced motion tracking technology, the game breaks physical barriers, enabling realistic sparring in a non-contact, virtual environment.

A groundbreaking virtual sporting event, proudly endorsed by World Taekwondo. Powered by cutting-edge technology, Virtual Taekwondo is poised to revolutionise the world of virtual sports.

name: Vikings: Sex and Blood
summary: Meet gorgeous women! Raid and defend your village, explore the islands of the north and build your own harem in Vikings: Sex and Blood!

name: Virtual ABC Journey
summary: Virtual ABC Journey is a virtual campus simulation experience. Wander effortlessly through a beautifully art-styled school and immerse yourself in warm memories and a nostalgic atmosphere. This emotional journey revives your campus—not just in photos or memory, but as a living digital space.

name: Vidya Poker
summary: Video poker, enhanced with modern styling and features! Now with Deuces Wild! Relax and casually play, until you win big!

name: Virus Survivor
summary: Virus Survivor is an action meat pigeon game, where you will eliminate many germs, challenge powerful super germs, and learn skills to strengthen your characters at the same time.

name: Viet Quoc Truyen Ky
summary: Viet Quoc Truyen Ky is an online role-playing game (MMORPG) with a strong classic, retro style, featuring familiar elements such as monster hunting, level grinding, item looting, and free item trading between players. The game is deeply intertwined with captivating legends and rich folklore.

name: Vibrant Dash
summary: Capture other player's pixels by running, jumping, dashing through procedural levels ! Vibrant Dash is a first-person platformer. The twist ? Every level is placed on a huge pixel grid. Capture a pixel by beating other's time on the associated level !

name: Village of the Ages
summary: If a giant tornado ended it all, can you rebuild? Guide villagers from the Early Ages to Middle Ages and beyond in this cute chaos village simulator. No progress bars, no tech trees. Paradise or inferno - you decide.

name: Vispo: Video Spot the Difference
summary: Spot Differences in videos. Simples. A new twist on the old favourite.

name: Villainy
summary: A game of cooperation and betrayal. Gather your party of 4-10 players, but trust no one. Heroes and Villains plot against each other in quick, highly intense matches. Deception is your greatest weapon, and secrecy is the ultimate defense.

name: Village Supermarket Simulator: Old Times Edition
summary: Build and run your very own old-fashioned village supermarket! Sell products, expand your store and become a legendary trading manager!

name: Virtuoso
summary: Virtual Reality musical sandbox, allowing live looping, recording, and limited editing in rhythm-reactive environments

name: ViralGuessr
summary: A guessing game where players aim to guess which of two presented viral videos has more views on TikTok.

name: Viper Patrol
summary: Strap yourself in and blast off to meet danger head on! Hone your skills to perfection as you blow apart wave upon wave of enemy vipers! Keep your finger on the trigger and your eyes on the incoming fighters as you remember only this... you're all you've got!

name: Viking Ventures
summary: In Viking Ventures, you awaken in a Viking hall suspended between life and death. There are no battles to fight—only conversations to unravel, keys to discover, and doors that may not lead where you expect. Explore shifting rooms, meet a cryptic bartender, and follow the pull of a quiet destiny in this short, atmospheric narrative adventure.

name: Victoria Kopernik: Mother
summary: Victoria Kopernik, an occult influencer, uncovers the dark history of a haunted mansion in a short horror point-and-click adventure video game.

name: Virtuoso GP Race: On
summary: An homage to early 3D racers: true ’90s handling with bespoke physics, checkpoints with EXTEND TIME, instant restarts, ghosts, and global leaderboards. Demo: Sakura Coast & Dunas de Giza.

name: Vindilis
summary: Save the island of Vindilis and defeat the Omniscient! A short, epic adventure that will pit you against powerful enemies in a hand-drawn, hand-animated universe. A short-form indie game vengeance, creation, and completing a quest.

name: Virus Brain
summary: Explore a surreal, abandoned Japanese city, collect credit cards from corpses and solve Kanji puzzles to get back your lost memories.

name: Viatica
summary: VIATICA is a Interactive Fiction CYOA-Type game set in a dystopian, post-apocalyptic future, with a focus on personal growth, as well as platonic, familial, and romantic bonds. You play as H-313, a healer in a world where speech is prohibited, books are outlawed, and any meaningful human interaction is nonexistent. Humans are reduced to the job they do for The City. You can create and customize your character: male, female, or non-binary; gay, straight, or bisexual. You can become an individual in a world of drones. Learn to speak, express your emotions, define your personality. Dream big, resist tyranny, inspire the masses, and forge a new world. Or not, it's all up to how you decide to play the game.

name: Virago: Herstory 2
summary: Willow returns in a psychological detective game where nothing is as it seems. As fear grips the town, she must face twisted truths, confront her past, and uncover dark secrets. A slow burning story of suspicion, silence, and survival.

name: Virago World
summary: Virago World is a cozy life sim with a dark twist. Grow and sell flowers, work at a shop, and decorate your home. Have your best friend Ollie the loyal bear who always protects you. But at night, survive stalkers hiding in the shadows.

name: Virago Run
summary: Virago Runner is a 2D adventure survival and runner game set in a sprawling, interconnected world with black and white gaphics.

name: ViragoHerstory Go!
summary: Join Willow, the brave hero of the Virago series, in ViragoHerstory Go! a thrilling hexagon block puzzle adventure. Walk on blocks, avoid traps, and escape enemies in a fast-paced challenge where every move matters. Blocks crumble if you stay too long, cannons fire at you, and traps are everywhere. Can you survive and outsmart every obstacle?

name: Virago: What If
summary:
The most asked question "What if Willow was a boy" has been answered.

Step into the enigmatic world of "Virago: What If," where reality blurs with hallucination, and the boundaries between protector and prey become indistinct. In this gripping interactive narrative adventure, you take on the role of Wolliw, a young boy with a unique gift and an unusual curse.

name: Vibe City Islands Architect
summary: The mayor has given you a budget; people need housing, jobs, parks. The city needs a tourism boost, now! It's actually a chill game.. 10 gangs, each with their own radio station. Build for the city, or for your favourite gang.......... You are the architect.

name: Victoriam
summary: GOLD, GLORY, GUTS! An auto battler roguelike where you construct your army from the finest soldiers and tear through your enemies in a never-ending war

name: V.I.P Client
summary: V.I.P Client is a single player horror game. You are trapped inside of a casino, your only way out is to play the twisted games of chance where the stake is your life. Luck and skill will be required in order to survive

name: Village Climb Obby
summary: Climb, jump, and parkour through a flooded village to reach the finish!

name: Vintage Store
summary: Vintage Story is an uncompromising wilderness survival sandbox game inspired by eldritch horror themes. Find yourself in a ruined world reclaimed by nature and permeated by unnerving temporal disturbances. Relive the advent of human civilization, or take your own path.

name: Virtual Ties: Isekaijoucho Musoukyoku
summary: Our protagonist, Kirishima Yu, returns from Tokyo to the island where he once lived and reunites with his childhood friend, Minase Seikai. Seikai, who had been on the verge of giving up on her dream of becoming an idol, looks somewhat gloomy. Wanting to make her smile again, Yu proposes that she debut as a virtual idol named "Isekaijoucho" based on an illustration he drew himself.

name: ...Vincent: Mansion of The Dead
summary: A twin stick shooter survivors-like with low-poly pixel art graphics and simple controls. Protect the ghost Winry from the Dark Lord's army. Let the soul harvest, Begin!

name: Victory Road
summary: Victory Road is a Rogue-Lite, Deck-Builder with a creature collecting twist. Pick a creature, set out on your adventure and try to complete the Victory Road challenge with a uniquely crafted deck of ability cards!

name: VIA
summary: VIA is a free-to-play MMORPG featuring third-person action combat focused on caravan-based PvP battles, where the risks you take equal your rewards. With a deep crafting system and no level grind, you access endgame content instantly, prioritizing professions that shape gameplay.

name: Victorian Dread
summary: In this point-and-click gothic adventure, Eleanor Rosewood, one of London's first female lawyers, will face an ancient evil. Gather evidence, and save your client from the gallows. Seek help from London's diverse populace, each with their own hidden lives and secrets, in this atmospheric game.

name: Villa Nocturne
summary: In a mansion shrouded in mist, face the ghosts of the past. With puzzles, exploration, and moments of sheer terror, Villa Nocturne awaits.

name: Violent Horror Stories 2
summary:
Violent Horror Stories 2 delivers a fresh lineup of horror games from different developers. Each title puts its own spin on the theme of confinement, complete with distinctive visuals, gameplay, and story. Expect roughly 30 minutes of playtime per game.

A brand‑new bundle from the creators of the short‑form horror hit Violent Horror Stories. This time the collection revolves around one chilling theme: confinement.

name: Vision Quench
summary: An online co-op dark fantasy looter shooter set in the underbelly of a consumer goods conglomerate mega dungeon. Within its halls you will fight ancient foes and modern horrors. Can you survive long enough to make it to the top?

name: Villains: Robot Battle Royale
summary: Villains: Robot Battle Royale is a casual style 4 minute Battle Royale MOBA made for mobile! Play with up to 18 players at a time in this exciting brawler.

name: Visceral Abyss
summary: Visceral Abyss is a cooperative survival horror game centered around exploration, and documentation. You and your friends play the role of a group of Mercenary Scientists who are tasked with exploring new areas, acquiring rare items, and documenting anything of interest inside a flesh cave.

name: Vifa
summary: Vifa is a survival-building game where each hero character brings unique talents that change how you play. Team up with friends, craft and build your base, deploy worker bots to gather resources, and assemble powerful mechs to defend your home.

name: Villain Academy
summary: A dark fantasy visual novel set in Villain Academy. Interact with supernatural characters including witches, vampires, dark elves, succubi, and fallen angels. Make choices that shape your path as you build relationships and uncover secrets.

name: Vietnam Warrior: Against the US Invasion
summary: Vietnam Warrior: Against the US Invasion is a 2D pixel-art action game that recreates the resistance war against the US. Players take on the role of guerrilla fighters, fighting through jungles, tunnels and historical campaigns.

name: Viaje al Centro de la Tierra: Versión Extendida
summary: Relive Jules Verne's great adventure with this game originally conceived for Amstrad CPC.

name: Virtual Skate: Winter Update
summary: The Winter Update comes with a new mini mega map, carve corners and pump transition, customize your clothes and gear with gear mod support, and more!

name: Viper Vice
summary:
Viper Vice throws you into the heart of a city ruled by power struggles and shifting alliances. As a skilled mercenary, you’ll navigate high-stakes missions, forge relationships with influential figures, and carve out your own path in a world where every decision matters. Will you outmaneuver your rivals, build your reputation, and rise to the top? The city is yours to explore — just be ready for the consequences of your actions.

Main Features:
Dynamic Missions: Take on high-risk jobs, from securing valuable assets to outsmarting rival factions. Strategy and reputation will determine your opportunities. Viper Vice has 70 story missions.
Allies & Rivals: Build trust with powerful figures or face opposition from those who seek to control the city. Your choices will shape your standing in this unpredictable world.
Unlock Weapons & Gear: Earn and customize a variety of high-impact weapons and cutting-edge equipment to stay ahead of the competition.
Reputation Matters: Prove your skills and gain influence. The more respect you earn, the more challenging—and rewarding—your opportunities become.
Urban Takeover: Expand your influence across the city through strategic alliances and calculated decisions. Every move you make affects the balance of power.
Step into the immersive world of Viper Vice, where ambition, strategy, and survival define your journey. Will you thrive in this high-stakes urban battleground, or will the city consume you? The choice is yours.

name: Virtue and a Sledgehammer
summary: Go back to your hometown and tear it down with a sledgehammer in this narrative exploration game. Confront your past in a devastating story about feeling like you no longer belong in the place you grew up.

name: Virtual Duck Hunt
summary:
Immerse Yourself in Nostalgia with Virtual Duck Hunt!

Relive the retro excitement of the legendary 1984 Duck Hunt in an entirely new way through virtual reality.

A modern VR tribute to a legendary classic.

Virtual Duck Hunt brings the iconic arcade-style duck shooting experience into virtual reality, reimagined for Meta Quest. Step into a fully immersive environment where fast-paced action, precise shooting, and playful humor meet modern VR mechanics.

Pick up your rifle, track the ducks in 3D space, and test your reflexes across increasingly challenging rounds. Easy to learn, hard to master — Virtual Duck Hunt is designed for quick fun sessions and competitive high scores.

name: Vie: Try Again
summary: When her evil brother takes over her temples in a ploy to rise to greater power, the Moon Goddess-- Vie-- enlists the help of a lowly town guardsman named Cut in order to take back her territory, stop her brother, try again, and save the world.

name: Vivariums
summary: Immerse yourself in the first-ever blend of classic Sudoku and first-person horror as you descend deeper into the unknown.

name: Virtual Fighter Maneuvers
summary: Master the art of modern air combat. Fly high performance fighter jets in intense dogfights with realistic flight and weapon physics. Duel against challenging AI opponents or compete with other players online. VR only!

name: Virtual Campus
summary: This is a first-person VR campus simulator where you can roam around the campus at night and cause some chaos.

name: Viscera Alien
summary: A Suika Game-style physics puzzle! Merge cute alien creatures called Viscera to create bigger ones. Combine two Level 11 Viscera to create an Alien and collect it in your encyclopedia! Simple yet addictive casual puzzle game.

name: Violet Impetus
summary: Violet Impetus is a bullet-hell arcade melee 'em up set in a series of (lightly) procedurally-generated arenas. Drop into different biomes to rid the world of Æris—the demiurge, petrificate & fractured. Its other children just won't see things eye to eye.

name: Vicky the Fox
summary: In Vicky the Fox and the Lost Days, play as a curious fox on a journey to recover the ten missing days of 1582. Explore enchanted worlds, unlock 22 unique abilities from Animal Cards, and solve the mystery of the Great Animal Calendar in this non-violent, cozy platformer.

name: Vinegar Mutter
summary: An eerie darkness has emerged. With it came creatures demanding servitude to the Vinegar Mutter. Those who dare to fight have been slaughtered and eaten. In this magic based retro shooter, you take the role of Cymon, a wizard making the journey to the source of the chaos in an effort to stop it.

name: Video Battle Arena
summary: Which YouTube video is more popular or engaging? Pick a topic and guess which of two YouTube videos has more views or more comments. Test your social media skills: How many can you get right?
